name: Banish
flavor: You sever the target's tenuous connection to the world.

metadata.flavor: You sever the target's tenuous connection to the world.

effects.tier1: 5 + M damage; P < WEAK, the target is banished (save ends)
effects.tier2: 8 + M damage; P < AVERAGE, the target is banished (save ends)
effects.tier3: 11 + M damage; P < STRONG, the target is banished (save ends)

effects.name: Effect
effects.effect: This ability gains an edge against demons, devils, undead, and creatures not native to your current world. If you know the target's true name, this ability has a double edge. While banished, the target is sent to another manifold in the timescape and removed from the encounter map. A banished target can do nothing but make saving throws, and takes 10 holy damage each time they do so. If the target is reduced to 0 Stamina while banished, they are lost to the timescape.
